sentences.en: A school of minnows swam by, each minnow with its small, individual shadow, doubling the attendance, so clear and sharp in the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 一群鲦鱼游过，每条都有虽小却不与众混淆的影子，阳光下清晰可观，从而一身两形。

sentences.en: Most frogs prefer a diet of flies, snails and - if them're feeling adventurous - an occasional minnow.
sentences.cn: 蛙类多以飞蝇 、 蜗牛为食 —— 假如它们想冒冒险 —— 偶尔也会吃吃小鱼.

sentences.en: Most frogs prefer a diet of flies, snails and - if they're feeling adventurous - an occasional minnow.
sentences.cn: 蛙类多以飞蝇 、 蜗牛为食 —— 如果它们想冒冒险 —— 偶尔也会吃吃小鱼.

sentences.en: One must lose a minnow to catch a salmon.
sentences.cn: 失去小鲤鱼,抓住大马哈鱼.

sentences.en: one of the minnows of the computer industry
sentences.cn: 计算机行业中一家微不足道的小公司

sentences.en: Operationally, too, PetroChina a minnow beside its peers.
sentences.cn: 在运营方面, 中石油与其同行相比也只是小字辈.

sentences.en: The ghastly minnow is part of the largest family of freshwater fish—but so far its fangs are unique.
sentences.cn: 这种面目狰狞的小鱼是数目最庞大的淡水鱼家族的成员，不过其獠牙迄今无其它物种可出其右。

sentences.en: The minnow too had grown and had become a full-fledged fish.
sentences.cn: 此时的小鲦鱼也已长大，长成了一条年轻健康的鲦鱼。

sentences.en: Their total catch was one minnow.
sentences.cn: 他们的全部所获是一条小鱼。

sentences.en: Throw out a minnow to catch a whale.
To throw out a minnow to catch a whale.
sentences.cn: 抛砖引玉(抛小鱼想捉鲸鱼).

sentences.en: Using a chicken feather as the body and some beads from a military ID tag as the eyes, I tied a fly that looked exactly like a minnow.
sentences.cn: 于是我用一根鸡毛做假饵的主体，用军籍牌上的一些珠子做眼睛，制作了一个看起来和小鱼一模一样的假饵。

trans.tran_cn: 米诺鱼（鲤科淡水小鱼），（用作鱼饵的）小鱼，诱饵鱼
trans.tran_en: A minnow is a very small fish that lives in lakes and rivers
